mapper.select: SELECT sup.num "number", sup.id, sup.title, sup.content, sup.image, sup.date_regi "date", sup.date_modi, sup.hits, sup.state FROM( SELECT rownum as rnum, sub.num, sub.id, sub.title, sub.content, sub.image, sub.date_regi, sub.date_modi, sub.hits, sub.state FROM ( SELECT num, id, title, content, image, date_regi, date_modi, hits, state FROM j_story WHERE state = 'Y' ORDER BY num DESC ) sub WHERE rownum <= #{endPage} ) sup WHERE rnum >= #{startPage}
SELECT count(*) TOTAL_TOT_CNT, CEIL(count(*) / #{rows}) TOTAL_PAGE FROM J_STORY S WHERE 1=1 AND S.STATE = 'Y'
